name: EDBV Management
overview: EDBV Management Pte Ltd (EDBVM) manages 10 venture capital and private equity investment funds exceeding US$400 million. It has made more than 100 investments to date in Singapore and overseas. EDBVM is wholly owned by EDB Investments Pte Ltd (EDBI) of the Singapore Economic Development Board (EDB). EDBVM’s investments aim to build successful commercial enterprises and support EDB’s thrusts in developing key industry clusters, entrepreneurship, enterprise globalisation, and emerging growth opportunities under EDB’s charter. The funds under management include EDB Ventures Pte Ltd, PLE Investments Pte Ltd, M-Commerce Ventures Pte Ltd, M-Commerce Ventures II Pte Ltd, Fabless Investments Pte Ltd and Pervasive Storage Investments Pte.

funding_round.source_description: JAM Technologies Closes $11.3 Million in New Funding - Funding to Drive Company Growth
